features: 1-fluid ounce pump bottle of Neutrogena Visible Repair Retinol Face & Neck Cream Moisturizer with Broad Spectrum SPF 30, retinol & hyaluronic acid. Your Rapid Wrinkle Repair anti-aging moisturizer got a makeover, a new look with the same efficacy

Anti-wrinkle face & neck moisturizer with retinol intended for beginners has been dermatologist-tested & has proven to smooth skin & improve skin clarity in one week & in just four weeks, reduce the look of fine lines & dark spots

Anti-age face cream features a combination of pure retinol, a dermatologist-proven form of vitamin A, to fight fine lines, dullness, wrinkles & dark spots & hyaluronic acid, to add plumping moisture to help hydrate & rejuvenate the look of skin

The daily moisturizer formula features Broad Spectrum SPF 30 sunscreen to protect skin from sun damage & help prevent sunburn, if used as directed, & is formulated without parabens, mineral oil & dyes

Our clinically tested formula with dermatologist proven pure retinol makes the perfect addition to your daily anti-age beauty & skincare routine for an at-home self-care experience & is the #1 retinol brand used most by dermatologists
Visible results in just one week
body.description: Help hydrate & protect skin while reducing the look of wrinkles with Neutrogena Rapid Wrinkle Repair Retinol Anti-Wrinkle Daily Moisturizer with Broad Spectrum SPF 30 Sunscreen. This fast-acting retinol face & neck cream visibly reduces the look of fine lines & wrinkles while protecting against sun damage. Great for a daily skincare routine, our anti-wrinkle formula has been dermatologist tested to smooth skin & improve skin clarity in one week & reduce the look of fine lines & dark spots in just four weeks. Formulated with retinol, a powerful dermatologist-proven form of vitamin A that fights fine lines, dullness, wrinkles & dark spots. Plus, hyaluronic acid, which adds plumping moisture to help hydrate & rejuvenate the look of skin. This Broad Spectrum SPF 30 skin protecting moisturizer is formulated without parabens, mineral oil & dyes & comes from the #1 retinol brand used most by dermatologists.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Application Tips: Apply evenly to cleansed face and neck every day. Turn pump to ‘closed’ position when not in use. For Retinol Beginners: Gradually phase into your skincare routine working in as tolerated. Visible Results: 1 week, see smoothed skin and improved skin clarity. 4 weeks, see reduced look of fine lines and dark spots. SPF 30: Super charged formula is combined with UVA/UVB SPF 30 for daily sun protection.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Overall, this is a perfect product!
reviews.reviewText: The Neutrogena Rapid Wrinkle Repair Retinol Face Moisturizer with SPF 30 Sunscreen works excellently for my needs. I highly recommend this product. It's not cheap, but it makes your skin feel great, protects it from the sun, and reduces lines/wrinkles. Overall, this is a perfect product!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This is a great product to tighten the skin and smooth out the wrinkles. The fragrance takes some getting used too but it could be worse.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Not bad for the price
reviews.reviewText: Overall this is a really good product!I notice some visible benefits like fine lines being less visible when I use it many days in a row. It is a decent all season sunscreen too and it is great for sensitive skin. (I tolerate this very well and I rarely find products that don’t cause a terrible reaction when I try something new) I don’t give it a full 5 stars for a simple reason: I struggle a little with the texture. It has a bit of that cakey feeling many sunscreens leave you with. I really wish it was more lightweight.To fix that, I usually end up mixing it up with a very light serum so it blends in a bit more and that makes a big difference.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I love the relaxing smell it has. I've seen a great difference on my skin. Definitely recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A Great Skincare Product
reviews.reviewText: I have been using this product for almost a year and have found it a great part of my skincare routine. I originally got it because I have dry skin, and didn't like how I was seeing some aging creeping into my forehead and around my eyes. I was looking for some thing effective, but didn't make my skin looks like it had been slathered with a heavy cream. I have tried several products, and this one seems to check most of the boxes I need: it is light, it is quickly absorbed, and it definitely hydrates. The container itself is a great dispenser, allowing you to only pump a limited amount of product so you don't feel like you are wasting it. I have found, even with daily and nightly use, that a single container can last me months. Full disclaimer, I do have a beard, so I mostly use this product on my cheeks, nose, forehead, and very carefully under my eyes. I tend to apply before bed at night, or after a morning shower. Though I haven't run into this case often, I wouldn't recommend applying within a couple hours before exercising, as I have had some issue with residue running with sweat from my forehead into my eyes. I didn't think to buy this product as a sunblock, but I have been AMAZED at how well it has served me this past summer, and I have taxed it quite a bit. I tend to apply it liberally to my forehead, and then more carefully around the side of my temples and along my cheekbones being careful not to pull any skin around my eye. I rub it into my cheeks and forehead and tap it into the more delicate skin under my eyes. Then I tap over everything with my finger tips to ensure I don't have any streaks or visible residue.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 28, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars itchy but smooth
reviews.reviewText: I have lighter Asian skin and am over 40. Some reviews mentioned a burning and itchiness when using. I experienced this the first few times I used this product too. But it no longer happens and truly, happened the first three or four times. I asked my dermatologist about it. It could be the retinol, if there is any retinol compounds in the lotion, which is common as the skin adjusts for some people. The burning was very mild and around the areas that get the most sun exposure and damage. It felt like a mild sun burn the first day when you hit the skin with hot water in the shower. The itching was mild too. One of those itches you get but don’t totally notice is happening until you itch it the fourth time. It was also very mild and only around my chin area. Both subsided and no longer happen. My husband is caucasian and didn’t experience the itching or burning at all. A rash never appeared or any other visible changes as my skin adjusted. Having said that, the lotion goes on very smoothly. I prefer this to the other Neutrogena sun block that is white and comes in a big tube. That smelled very chemically and burned when I sweat. This seems more absorbent and the smell as milder. I have been using this for several months and the areas where I had denser sunspots is actually lighter. This could be the result of many things but using this lotion is the only thing I changed in my skincare routine.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Really like the smell smooth perfect, works great

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Makes my skin feel wonderful
reviews.reviewText: I bought this item because it said it had both hyaluronic acid and retinol. However, the ingredients do not list hyaluronic acid on the bottle (unless it has a different name). But I love how it makes my skin feel and I THINK my wrinkles are less dramatic.

reviews.reviewTitle: Confezione aperta e potrebbe essere usata
reviews.reviewText: Confeziona arrivata aperta in quel modo e danneggiata .. per quanto ne so la crema potrebbe essere stata usata perché era aperta e senza adesivo di sicurezza. Sono molto delusa.
Très bon produit qui fait du bien à peau et qui sent bon. Très agréable sur la peau du visage

Value product from Neutrogena.Thanks to Amazon for a lower price as usual for cosmetic and healthcare products.It works effectively on the skin especially when you're in thirties.It's a good moisturizer too.
my 80yo mother particularly swears by this stuff. She says it is the best wrinkle-reducing moisturiser, better than any expensive branded skincare she has tried in her entire life.
